product_name: FalconGuides Climbing and Hiking in the Wind River Mountains - 3rd Edition
long_description: The updated and full-color Climbing and Hiking in the Wind River Mountains offers comprehensive information for climbing routes, hiking trails and summit routes throughout this area of Wyoming.
short_description: The updated and full-color Climbing and Hiking in the Wind River Mountains offers comprehensive information for climbing routes, hiking trails and summit routes throughout this area of Wyoming.
